      • getReport

        @GetMapping(value="/informe",
            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getReport()

        Application end point to get the weather report of all the days since the application is running

        Returns:
        A Map with the quantity of days of each weather type since the application is running.
